title: Array translation record
description: This record simply allows to get the value string by the key, value can be an array to help break one-line texts in multiple lines for readability or to reference other translation records by their keys

anyOf.title: Reference to an argument of another record processed by a plugin (parametrized translation record)
anyOf.description: Value must refer to a record that is already referenced in this array

anyOf.title: A single part of a plain-string translation record
anyOf.description: Can be a reference key of another translation record

anyOf.title: A reference to a parametrized translation record
anyOf.description: Inserts the parametrized value into the string, provide an object with key that references the record and a value to serve as parameters if applicable. If the key doesn't reference a parametrized record, simply leave the array empty - [].

^.+$.title: A reference to a parametrized translation record
